February 20, 1923
Dear Doctor Carter:
div1.p:
I just observe that I have never
acknowledged your letter of January 27 with
reference to Doctor Houle's report, commenting
on his use of the water boatman (notonecta.)
We have written to Doctor Connor suggesting
that if he has not already done so, he make
experiments with this insect.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, Florence M. Read Doctor H. R. Carter
Assistant Surgeon General
2121 California Street, N.W.
Washington, D.C.
